member.name: T:ModifiableParameters.Calculators.IParameterCalculator`1
member.summary: Algorithm for applying the modifier list to calculate the CurrentValue of the parameter.

member.name: T:ModifiableParameters.Calculators.EmptyModifiersRequirement
member.summary: Returns parameter base value if don't contain any modifiers. If parametr has any modifiers, returns !BaseValue.

member.name: T:ModifiableParameters.Calculators.AndGateCalculator
member.summary: Returns BaseValue if it and all modifiers value the same (or modifiers count is 0). If contains modifiers with another values, returns !BaseValue.

member.name: T:ModifiableParameters.Calculators.SameModifiersValueRequirement
member.summary: Returns true if parameter base value and all modifiers value the same. If don't contain any modifiers, returns true.

member.name: T:ModifiableParameters.Calculators.FloatAdditionCalculator
member.summary: Adds the parameter base value and modifiers value.

member.name: T:ModifiableParameters.Calculators.IntAdditionCalculator
member.summary: Adds the parameter base value and modifiers value.

member.name: T:ModifiableParameters.Limiters.IParameterLimiter`1
member.summary: Limiter allows to apply some requirements to calculated CurrentValue. Use for setting limits for current value or checking for 0, etc.

member.name: M:ModifiableParameters.Limiters.IParameterLimiter`1.IsMeetLimit(ModifiableParameters.Parameters.IParameter{`0},`0@)
member.summary: Check if the argument correctedCurrValue meets some requirements. If not, change ref correctedCurrValue to correct value and return false.
member.returns: True if correctedCurrValue meet this limiter.

member.name: T:ModifiableParameters.Limiters.FloatModifierBanLimiter
member.summary: Checks the list of modifiers for forbidden value. If it finds a banned value, changed correctedCurrValue to this limiter СorrectedValue.

member.name: T:ModifiableParameters.Limiters.FloatMaxValueLimiter
member.summary: Задает максимальное значение для CurrentValue параметра.

member.name: T:ModifiableParameters.Limiters.FloatMinValueLimiter
member.summary: Задает минимальное значение для CurrentValue параметра.

member.name: T:ModifiableParameters.Parameters.ALimitableParameter`1
member.summary: Abstract parameter that implements ILimitable interface. Limiters apply to CurrentValue after recalculate and allow you to limit the resulting value.

member.name: T:ModifiableParameters.Parameters.FloatComplexCalculator
member.summary: Multiplies NumericPart value by MultiplierPart value.
